# SegmentDefinitions.GetNoIdentifierMapping method

Gets the segment class type for a marker without an identifier.

```csharp
public Type? GetNoIdentifierMapping(Marker marker)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| marker | The marker to map to a segment class type. |

## Return Value

The segment class type, or `null` if a mapping is not found.
